/>
X.ii.1.B.1.f
.
When Protection Does Not Accrue
Under
38 U.S.C. 110
and
38 CFR 3.951(b)
, protection does not accrue for
a Veteran who renounces entitlement to disability benefits, or
ratings for other than compensation purposes, such as ancillary benefits.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Protected Ratings
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
